title: Sold: 1909-11 T206 Piedmont Bunk Congalton PSA 9 MINT (OC)
author: Epps

posts.post_title: Sold: 1909-11 T206 Piedmont Bunk Congalton PSA 9 MINT (OC)
posts.post_content:
Sold is a PSA 9 (MC) Piedmont 350 of Bunk Congalton. This is the sharpest T206 that I have ever owned. Unfortunately, the front is pretty far off to the left, but the back is still very nicely centered. Beautiful card! $550 Delivered. PM or email me at [url]eppersmatt@yahoo.com[/url] with questions or offers. 

$550 Sold
